casebody.data:
SUMMIT LODGING, LLC, a North Carolina Limited Liability Company, and Walter W. Kennedy, Joseph J. Turner, Jr., William Kelly Durham, Robert J. McGinn, and James H. Tindal, Jr., as members of Summit Lodging, LLC
v.
JONES, SPITZ, MOORHEAD, BAIRD & ALBERGOTTI, P.A., and Edward A. Spitz. No. 215P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. James C. Thornton, Raleigh, for Jones, Spitz, et al. A. Charles Ellis, E. Bradley Evans, Greenville, for Summit Lodging, et al. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 627 S.E.2d 259 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
